name: ts-node-dev

scripts.test: node ./bin/ts-node-dev --exit-child --tree-kill --clear -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ./test/ts/add-require -r ./test/ts/add-require-2 -r esm -O "{\"module\": \"es6\"}" --preserve-symlinks --respawn --ignore-watch 'lib' --ignore-watch bin --prefer-ts --debug --poll --interval 1000 --cache-directory .ts-node --inspect -- test/ts/test-script test-arg --fd
scripts.test-docker: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/app mhart/alpine-node:8.7.0 sh -c 'cd app && node ./bin/ts-node-dev --cache-directory .ts-node test/ts/big'
